name: Prison Break: Sniper Shoot
description:
Prison Break: Sniper Shoot is an action packed adventure game that involves prison escape with the help of a sniper shooter with precision shooting skills. It’s hard time staying in prison for a crime somebody else committed. Some criminal inmates jail breaker has told an epic story about their escape from prison
FEATURES
- Ground breaking dynamics during silent sniper missions
- Real Prison breakout experience
- 20 unique prison sniper escape missions
- Every prison breakout mission will be more challenging
- Rescue the criminals by let them breakout
